snippet: False alarms forced students and staff members to flee at the University of Texas, Austin; North Dakota State University, Fargo; and Hiram College in northeast Ohio.
abstract: University of Texas at Austin, North Dakota University at Fargo, and Hiram College in northeast Ohio are evacuated after receiving bomb threats; no explosives were found and officials say it is not clear who made the threats or if they are connected.
lead_paragraph: False alarms forced students and staff members to flee at the University of Texas, Austin; North Dakota State University, Fargo; and Hiram College in northeast Ohio.

headline.main: Colleges in Three States Report Bomb Threats
headline.print_headline: Colleges In Three States Report Bomb Threats
